Text.content:
The settings can be grouped by

  • setting how to find the content at all
  • setting which information from the content are indexed in which way

Section.Caption: Configure how to find the content

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: How to find an XML content is configured via the attributes of the <searchsettings> node. If you do not add the node at all, it's similar to stating it with the default values.
